body:
# State of the Repo Report, February 2020

## Introduction

For all fans of statistics â enjoy! ð¤

859 authors (+5) have contributed to the project (merged contributions). Thank you! â¤ï¸

The repo contains 525 353 (+5 505) lines of text and 1 919 (+60) files.

22 980 (+217) commits have been made of which 4 767 (+77) are merge commits.

There are currently 349 (+3) open pull requests from in total 94 (+5) contributors.

If all open pull requests were merged the project line count would grow by roughly 35 percent.

The total set of open pull requests adds 210 534 lines, removes 23 281 lines and touches 3 345 distinct files.

The "median open pull request" adds 55 lines, removes 2 lines and touches 4 files.

Previous edition: [State of the Repo, January 2019](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/18041)
